title: How Colleen Hoover Rose to Rule the Best-Seller List
description: With legions of devoted fans and a knack for high-voltage emotional drama, Hoover has sold more than 20 million books. And she’s done it her way.
dc:creator: Alexandra Alter
media:credit: Jake Dockins for The New York Times
media:description: Colleen Hoover at home in Texas this month. “She’s defying the laws of how the market works,” said an industry analyst.
